definitions.text: destitute of blood or apparently so; - John Dryden
examples: the bloodless carcass of my Hector sold

definitions.text: without vigor or zest or energy
examples: an insipid and bloodless young man

definitions.text: devoid of human emotion or feeling
anemic looking from illness or emotion; ; ; ; ; - Mary W. Shelley
examples: tried to speak with bloodless lips
lips...livid with the hue of death
